title: Crash when taking dragon
body: me and my friend were playing and then when we took dragon our games crashed and we had to restart our computers and re-launch the game. this hapend for one more player in the game.

replies.body: Huh...that's pretty weird. I'd try running a quick repair just in case some of the dragon game files were missing or corrupted and that's what caused the crash, but definitely let our techs know in a ticket if this keeps happening.
